name: Escape the flames (Benni_Tr)
description:
This is a one level demo from my game named 'Escape the flames'

Help the little baby panda Panpom to climb up the mountain where he can seak savety from the forest fire. 

Control the charakter with:

This is my first Unreal Engine project. I created this game while my third semester at htk academy hamburg with the help of my lecturers and co students.
